Name: Placement of suicide prevention phones on certain bridges controlled and operated by the city of New York.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the placement of suicide prevention phones on certain bridges controlled and operated by the city of New York.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new chapter 8 to read as follows: 

CHAPTER 8
BRIDGES
§ 19-801  Suicide prevention phones.
§ 19-801  Suicide prevention phones.  a.  For the purposes of this section, the term “suicide prevention phone” shall mean a telephone which, when utilized, shall immediately connect a caller to a trained suicide prevention counselor.
b.  The department shall install at least one suicide prevention phone at least every one hundred feet on any bridge controlled and operated by the department that is at least fifty feet above the surface of the ground or water.  For any bridge that operates in two directions, the suicide prevention phones shall be installed at least every one hundred feet in both directions.
§2. This local law shall take effect one hundred twenty days after it is enacted.

PH
LS # 3964
11.30.07 - 11 am
